titles.title: Make A Joyful Shout To The Lord#1 (Psalm 100)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make a joyful shout to the Lord, All you lands! Serve the Lord with gladness. Come before His presence with singing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Enter His gates with thanksgiving, And into His courts with praise. Be thankful to Him and bless His name and Make a joyful shout to the Lord! Oh!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For the Lord is good; His mercy everlasting. His truth endures to all generations. The Lord is good; His mercy everlasting So make a joyful shout to the Lord! Oh!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’ll make a joyful shout to You Lord Through all the Land! We’ll serve You Lord with gladness And come into Your presence with singing!{/lang-eng}
